comments.comment: Man basically retired at age 30, moved with his wife to the other side of the world and now he can just allow himself to read, exercise and go on cute dates and trips all the time. What a dream.
I love how Pewds has totally disconnected from the drama of the internet, twitter, etc, but still is in contact with the fans. Keep up the good work, Pewds.

It’s crazy how they both stayed together all this time and are now becoming parents, I was 12 when I saw Marzia on his channel and now I’m 21 and felix is becoming a dad, truly these two were soul mates, and Marzias touch on the editing is superb, I bet you’re both so proud of each other x
We joked how Felix was our father figure. But knowing he's going to be a father, and is showing a lot of dedication and care to Marzia. He's really done us proud.
After watching Felix for so many years, seeing him building a baby chair and visit places in Japan with Marzia makes me legit emotional, I'm so proud of him.

Everytime you mention the baby it brings a smile to my face, I can't believe how happy it makes me watching you guys live out your lives in a place you've always wanted. These videos are so heart warming.

I swear this is a match made in heaven. These two are genuinely meant for each other, and I love seeing how much they take care of each other as well. Never seen a better couple. These videos years down the road will be a great treasure for their family.

Almost want to cry each time I see one of these videos. It's insane to think this guy raised an entire generation, including myself, with his amazing character and sense of humor. This world doesn't deserve Felix. He's gonna make a great dad, I know it.

The fact i was just a just a kid watching this man 10+ years ago, now im 25 watching him get married and have a kid... just vlogging his amazing life, god it hits me deep. I'll never forget the pewds who just played horror games and over reacted on purpose lmao.
Imagine the moment when the child grows up and realises how much of a legend his dad is.
So cool to see Felix and Marzia living their best lives and preparing for a baby. So wholesome, wishing them the best.

I'm just so glad I can catch actual glimpses of Marzia again. She was my idol growing up, her grace and calm, her love for art and designing, and her aesthetics really influenced me a lot. I miss her  but I also love that she's staying private and doing what she wants away from the public life. Thank you for showing her from time to time Felix.
Marzia is one of the best editors I've come across on youtube. Her touch and the atmosphere she hits is splendid and cozy in a way. Bullseye every single time!
Felix's kid is gonna have the opportunity to get a Japanese, Italian, and Swedish passport in their life, wild
Seeing Chris showing Felix some of the places he visited in his old videos is like relieving past videos from a new perspective and I love it.
Pewds and Marzia are entering their parent phase so well. The clips of vacation and everything just screams being a dad. Im so happy for you both!
ok but pewdiepie calling Marzia "mommy" is so cute, they're really steping into their parents era and I'm loving it
Looking back, it really feels like a privilege growing up watching Pewds and now being able to see this part of his life too, once we’re grown up ourselves. Thanks for sharing all of this, Felix!
Felix is literally Living like my dream...doing a job that you love, retired at 30,moved to a country that you like,statrd a family..so happy for you man
There is just something about these videos. It’s definitely her editing and your guys’ personality that just makes these videos so great
love this new content its like a blend of marzia's old content and felix's current style <3

Watching you Felix grow as a person has been an amazing experience. There's been ups and downs but this man made it. He's living how he wants and is having a baby!! Congrats on becoming an idol to so many of us growing up. WE LOVE YOU PEWDS!!
Hadn't watched pewdiepie in a fat minute, this honestly made my night. I'm so happy to see Felix and Marzia happy together having fun with one another.

I wish everyone could end up like these two, I know we don’t know him personally but from the outside this looks like such a happy life, the ultimate goal. Best of luck to everyone trying at this future
Watching Felix being happy with Marzia puts tears in my eye
seeing them write the baby name and like make things for the baby made me tear up. we seen them both grow up into such fine adults, man I'm so excited
I love that Marzia is comfortable with getting more screentime during the vlogs
I don't watch pewds as much anymore, but I like checking in every now and then. And this whole Japan arc is so wholesome.. they seem happy, and I for one am happy for them

It's so crazy, I started watching pewdie 13 years ago, when I first started high school. Now I'm watching him become a dad as my own baby sleeps in the next room. It's been a great ride and I'm so happy he and Marzia are loving their lives in Japan. Thank you for all the wonderful years, Pewds. You got me through a lot!

Their baby is going to know what real love looks like and feels like. The way that they are with each other and especially they way how Felix treats Marzia and her him. I’m just happy that he’s sharing his life with us and we get to witness their love  and them growing together as a family. They are BOTH such a huge inspiration to simply be at peace and live their life how they want. Thank you Felix and Marzia for allowing us to see your life. I’m 26 and grew up watching you both
i can’t imagine how weird it would be to see my dads entire life documented. this kid is gonna know felix more than any of us ever knew our dads.
I love you PewDiePie. I grew up with you and it makes me happy when you and Marzia are having fun. I wish you a great life, Felix.
The guy is living a life almost none of us will ever live, and knows it. He deserves everything he has. Never a humbler guy.
This is genuinely so wholesome. Seeing Felix so happy and building a baby chair.. makes me wanna cry
Felix feeding me through the screen is the next level of brofist
Chris and Pewds going on an adventure together is actually wholesome

For the past 3-4 years I stopped watching pewd's videos, I don't remember why, I used to wait for him to upload every single day as a teen. As I've grown up and gotten a job, I've had less and less time to do things that gave me joy but seeing pewds living a completely different and happy life somehow connects my teen life to adult life (idk if this makes sense lol) Hoping the best for you bro B-)

Felix looks more like his dad every day.

I'm so happy for you, Felix. Congratulations and thank you for still giving us a peak into your world. 
You've been a part of things keeping me alive. Thank you.
This is pure serotonin, watching his videos. Seeing how calm and peaceful their life is in Japan just makes me so happy for them

This is the best content on YouTube.  No teams of people no crew.  No click bait.   
Just felix and Marzia living their life and being so wholesome.
These vlogs feel like a slice of life sequel or a prologue to an action packed novel where finally now the MCs are fully able to focus on these little moments. Just makes me feel so warm and fuzzy <3
Marzia is shining. The edits are getting better and better. You guys are amazing.
Has me in tears knowing Pewd's gonna be such an amazing dad and Marzia is gonna be a wonderful mom

This is truly so deserved. Its like a king finally giving up his spot to live his life with his wife and child. In a place that they can call home and feel the peace of all their hard work. It's beautiful

i havent watched pewds in quite a while now , but bloody hell does it feel nice opening one of his latest videos , man is chilling and i srsly love to see him finally stoping to live his life and enjoy everything around him , and the fact he decided to not down right leave but rather keep posting these cute videos to anyone intrested is just heartwarming , love you pewds , thanks for all the laughs and entertainment throughtout the years

As a Japanese, I really like the fact that you are trying to understand Japan, not just live in Japan. Especially, I really like that you are interested in and studying the Meiji Restoration. Many Japanese, especially boys, are romantic about the Meiji Restoration, and it is a popular field of history. It was a pillar of modern Japan and the last period of domestic wars.

This is so freaking cool being able to follow this new chapter of theirs. Made my heart melt seeing the feeding chair! Also so happy to see that every one of the comments on here are supportive.. no drama, nothing toxic. Love it!
edgar being a tired, sweet old man and also momo the tiny chaos gremlin is such a great vibe

This video, to me, feels like the perfect personification of what youtube should be. It is genuine, simple, but well edited at the same time. The kind of content that has so much passion it becomes nostalgic.
i love Marzia's filmmaking/editing. she has mastered her own craft

IKEA dad building baby furniture. Its been so many years since I've discovered your Amnesia and Ao oni videos back in 2013. Seeing you and Marzia living life to the fullest in Japan gave me legit emotional feelings.
I am so in love with these laidback vlogs. The aesthetics, the no chaos, just vibes and genuine moments.
Beautiful video Felix, best of wishes to your child. They couldn’t have been any luckier to have both you and Marzia as their parents.

Felix i just wanted to say thank you! (thanks marzia for the great editing) these vlogs help me remind to perceive happiness and it helped me get help with my weed and alcohol addiction i also have therapy to get over my past now and i’ve not felt this great in years. still a long journey but my dog and nature helps me stay clear. truly love you guys how weird it even feels to say to someone i’ve never met before lmao, love to see you happy to make videos again!

Gosh, these vlogs are everything! Funny, endearing, interesting, silly, dogs, Marzia growing a baby, Felix so happy to become a dad, travel, culture, etc. Thank you for sharing this season of your lives with us.

My husband and myself have followed PewDiePie's journey for the longest time. We are also huge for Japan and been twice ourselves. So seeing this brings back so many memories. We found out we were pregnant a few months prior to Felix and Marzia announcing their pregnancy, with our first child too. It's just a nice and warm experience. Our little girl is due in just over 5 weeks. Thankyou for showing us your journey throughout the years ️

Felix has always had such respect towards Marzia, but it's extra cute to see him being so attentive towards her now that she's pregnant. They're going to be the best parents  These were such pretty adventures, it really made me want to visit Japan more than I already do.
one of the few youtubers i still have respect for
"I'm going to the UK next month... But I wanna stay" I am so incredibly happy with how good life has turned out for you pewds!
It's always so heartwarming to see Felix and Marzia be together, after all the time I watch them my tear pent up a bit.
It makes me so happy that they can go out in public without getting swamped by fans
Watched them both back in 2012. Seeing both Felix and Marzia age with grace like this... has me feeling proud, happy, and inspired :') I love you guys :')

Just happy to see Pewds at peace. Being able to share his journey still, but on a lighter mood. Thank you pewds for contuining to share your story. As a bro, regardless of what you post, I am always looking forward. To more journeys with you bro!

There are so many comments on this video I know this one might not be seen by anyone but, I’m excited for Marzia and Felix, and their pugs welcoming a lovely baby into their lives. I know when the baby comes you guys are gonna be all in on baby/new parents life so I know and hope you take all the time you need to focus on this beautiful moment in life. Ive always loved your videos and I look forward to see how life continues for all of you. It’s comforting to spend time seeing the little day trips you go on, the cute mono and Edgar moments and the dynamic you and Marzia have. Thank you both for taking care of yourselves and sharing the beautiful moments life has to offer in these videos.

You can see how happy Marzia and Flex are.
The move to Japan seems to have done wonders for them both.

I always look forward to these vlogs.  Right now I don't have the money to travel to Japan and it is my number 1 place to go to.  So seeing these makes it feel like I'm travelling when I can't physically do it. Also Felix and Marzia's story is always a brightness to see.  Very wholesome and it's very chill vibes.
Can we just take a moment to talk about how Marzia is just GLOWING!
I love that you and Chris have developed a friendship. You’ve both been two of my favourite creators for so long. It’s like chocolate and peanut butter—great by themselves, better together.
I always love his vlogs, they're edited so well, not to mention how happy they both seem. So happy for them both and that they are living their dreams to the fullest! We love you Felix and Marzia!
i’m so thankful you’re sharing these experiences with us even after all these years. love all ur videos

I find myself entranced by your videos more and more these days. You two are really just...LIVING. All those years, suffering through doing things you didn't want to do, but also pouring your heart and soul into work has granted you something amazing: Freedom to live your life.

Wild. Good job dude.
love that marzia edits all your vlogs, the 2016 nostalgia means everything to me
I never really thought pewdiepie could improve his channel so much like this I’ve been watching him since I was a young kid and I’m now 18 and it’s just so refreshing to watch these vlogs

It makes me so happy to see you hanging out with Chris. I love you both and it's nice to see you guys together and having a fun time. :) Also Marzia looks more beautiful than ever~ Thank you for sharing this part of your life with us! <3

There are so many emotions delivered while watching this. But I think the main one is bliss.
And I genuinely can not wish you anything else. You two, four and soon five, live the best life, take care of each other.
And when you offer us this window to accompany you every now and then, it's a pleasure to come along and feel the good vibes.
happy that felix is living his life now. His. content is not forced anymore to please us. Just him being himself
Felox and Chris hanging out and making content for us to feel a part of their adventures, it’s everything I could wish for on social media as a whole.
two of my favourite youtubers combined- Please keep creating content together Chris and Felix!

I got to admit that when pewds said that the birthday hat worn by edgar was also worn by a legend 
(Maya) teared me up a little.. I’ve been watching this channel since I was 14 and I really miss her 🥹
love to see felix and marzia happy and living their best life. japan must be a dream to live there.
It's truly interesting how a man who I've never met and will never truly "know" has had such an impact on my life. Seeing these vlogs fill me with a very specific type of happiness.
30:00 for the “being followed by fans” part
felix and marzia dedicating a tile to their baby has me basically in tears. you guys deserve all this happiness ️

I have no idea why I’m so damn emotional watching this. Thanks pewds, watching your videos for all these years has been an absolute pleasure. I’m positive y’all will knock parenthood outta the park! Becoming a father was and is still the most amazing thing to happen to me! Looking forward to more Vlogs in the future!
pewds putting out long vids to fix our attention spans coz he knows no matter how long his vids are, we're gonna watch till the end.
21:37 You two are too wholesome, it makes me cry
After all the crap happening in the news, coming back every once and a while to see Felix enjoying life, for some reason always calms me down and gives me hope.

Been watching you both since I was a teenager. And now,  married and pregnant with my first child, not far off from Marzia, it's nice to feel as though you all are changing and growing up with me. I wish you two health and wealth in abundance.

As a Mom there’s nothing more heartwarming for me then watching you guy’s experience becoming parents and experiencing it for yourselves firsthand , I always tell people you will love your nieces and nephews but once you have your own little one everyone else’s pale in comparison… thank you for sharing such a special time!
the way he said "but I don't want to leave" bc it was so pretty reached my soul on a different level,,, it felt so genuine
This is one of the coolest videos I have ever watched as someone who was been watching this guy for 12 years... it makes me so happy to see him like this.
26:27 wow Marzia is really glowing! She looks so beautiful, I would say that both are looking healthier than ever!
Can't even imagine what it's like to live careless like that. They look so chill and happy though. Thanks for sharing it with us.
20:28 - straight up loving how he can in all this mess and chaos have an eye for whats really important, meaning the beauty surrounding him.

I've been watching since way back when Amnesia was still popping off. I can't describe the typhoon of emotions I feel seeing this man who I watched grow up just a little ahead of me getting to live the dream. Felix, if by some strange twist of fate you see this, know that I (and certainly more or less all of your fans) am proud of you.
So happy to see you’re loving your best life now Pewdiepie. Thanks so much for sharing some of it with us
Thank you Pewds for sharing these videos with us, it means so much to just tune out everything and watch something this wholesome and heartwarming. <3
Cant say how much i love u guys, Marzia and pewds! u deserve a happy life. i wish the bests for you. it's so beautiful seeing yall as a parent. stay safe and happy. <3

Bruh, if you follow him for so long, watching this somehow feels different.
It is really something. Amazing
This made me so happy. Thanks for making my day, Felix and family.. also it's really nice seeing Felix and Chris hanging out together.
